contentList.content: Assume the shape of a venomous spider that can <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> with attacks and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ToxicSpit_VenomSpider">spit venom</LSTag> at enemies.

Assume the shape of a phase spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ToxicSpit_PhaseSpider_WSO">spit venom</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_EtherealJaunt_WSO">phase</LSTag> in and out of the Ethereal Plane.
Assume the shape of the Phase Spider Queen

It has all the abilities of the other spiders: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider">Web</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Cocoon_PhaseSpiderQueen_Wildshape">Cocoon</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ToxicSpit_PhaseSpiderQueen_WSO">Venomous Discharge</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_EtherealJaunt_WSO">Ethereal Jaunt</LSTag>.
Assume the shape of a giant wolf spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider">Enweb</LSTag> enemies.

Assume the shape of a giant spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider">Enweb</LSTag> enemies. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENTOMBED">Cocoon</LSTag> enemies at level 10.

Assume the shape of a giant spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider">Enweb</LSTag> enemies. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENTOMBED">Cocoon</LSTag> enemies at level 6.

Assume the shape of a bulette that has a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_DeadlyLeap_Bulette_WSO">powerful leap</LSTag> that deals massive damage and pushes enemies back, possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> (and will have the ability to burrow if we'll be able to implement it later on).
Expectorate on a target with acid. Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes the acid stronger.
On Miss: Target still takes a half/full damage - it is only made as a ranged attack so it doesn't take a full action.

Assume the shape of an owlbear that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump_Owlbear_Wildshape_Lunge_WSO">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Owlbear_Wildshape_Smash_WSO">Rapture</LSTag> the ground and become <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Owlbear_Wildshape_Enrage">Enraged</LSTag>.
Can also knock <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> nearby creatures with a powerful landing.

Let out a powerful screech, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">scaring</LSTag> nearby enemies away, and give in to the owlbear's rage, increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 2.
The owlbear is enraged! <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> are increased by 2.
Rupture the earth, causing debris to tear through nearby objects and enemies. Deals damage and possibly pushes enemies back.
Targets still take half damage, but do not get pushed back.
Exhale a blast of freezing wind.
Shapeshift into a Young Red Dragon.

Assume the shape of a Dire Raven that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_RendVision_Raven_Summon">Blind</LSTag> enemies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Wildshape_Flyby">without provoking enemy attacks</LSTag>.
As a Dire Raven you also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag>.
Doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when flying out of an enemy's reach.

Assume the shape of a panther that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Pounce_Panther_WSO">Pounce</LSTag> on enemies, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Ambush_Panther">Ambush</LSTag> them from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_JugularStrike_Panther_WSO">strike</LSTag> <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> enemies with a bonus action.

Assume the shape of a panther that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Pounce_Panther_Moon">Pounce</LSTag> on enemies, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Ambush_Panther_Moon">Ambush</LSTag> them from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_JugularStrike_Panther_Moon">strike</LSTag> <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> enemies with a bonus action.

As a panther you're also able to Hide and Disengage with a bonus action, and have Proficiency in Stealth and Perception.

Becomes stronger and gains Expertise in Stealth at level 6.

As a panther you can also <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide_BonusAction_Panther">Hide</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage_BonusAction">Disengage</LSTag> with a bonus action, have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag>.
Leap at a target to slash it with claws and possibly knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

Leap at an unsuspecting prey, slashing it with claws and making an additional <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Panther_WSO">Bite</LSTag>, as you attack from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag>.

Leap at an unsuspecting prey, slashing it with claws and making an additional <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Panther_Moon">Bite</LSTag>, as you attack from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag>.
Counts as a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> and does additional damage depending on your rogue level.
Lunge at a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> creature's throat.

Assume the shape of the Winter Wolf that can exhale <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Winter_Wolf_Cold_Breath_Wildshape">Cold Breath</LSTag>, and has <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Winter_Wolf_Resistance_Cold">resistance to Cold damage</LSTag>, besides being able to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire_WSO">Incite</LSTag> allies, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Dire_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> them.
As a Winter Wolf you are resistant to Cold damage.
As a Venom Spider you are resistant to Poison damage.
As a Venom Spider you are <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Venom_Spider_Resistance_Poison">resistant to Poison damage</LSTag>.
Assume the shape of a worg that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Dire_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
As a worg you also gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Worg_Rampage_BonusAttack">Rampage</LSTag>.

Assume the shape of a hyena that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Becomes a stronger giant hyena at level 6, gaining the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire_WSO">Incite</LSTag> allies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies.

Assume the shape of a giant hyena that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire_WSO">Incite</LSTag> allies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Dire_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies at level 6.

Assume the shape of a wolf that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Becomes a stronger dire wolf at level 6, gaining the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire_WSO">Incite</LSTag> allies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies.

Assume the shape of a dire wolf that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire_WSO">Incite</LSTag> allies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Dire_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies at level 6.
As a wolf you also gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="PackTactics">Pack Tactics</LSTag>.
As a hyena you also gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="PackTactics">Pack Tactics</LSTag>.
Bite a target and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> it.
Spit out a venomous missile that can damage multiple targets, and leaves a puddle of poison on hit.
Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes poison more potent.
Becomes even more potent and can apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> at later levels (level 6 for moon druids / level 10 for other druids).

Spit out a venomous missile that can damage multiple targets and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> those it hits. Leaves a puddle of poison on hit. Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes poison more potent.
Spit out a venomous missile that can damage multiple targets and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> those it hits. Leaves a puddle of poison on hit.
Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes poison more potent.
Bite a target and deal additional poison damage.
Phase in and out of the Ethereal Plane. Your movement on Ethereal Plane before coming back make it seem like teleport.
When you kill a target on your turn, you regain half your movement and can make a bite attack as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> on that turn.
Make a bite attack as a bonus action
Can make a bite attack as a bonus action
